# Contributing Guidelines

Thank you for considering contributing to DevState.

Before you start, please:
- Read our Code of Conduct (`.github/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md`).
- Ensure changes pass local checks: `make devstate-ci` or `make devstate-up && make devstate-init && make devstate-health && make devstate-verify && make devstate-export`.

Submitting changes:
- Fork and create a feature branch.
- Write clear, atomic commits and include tests where possible.
- Open a Pull Request using the template and describe motivation, design and impact.

Issues:
- Use the issue templates (bug/feature) and provide reproducible steps and environment details.

More guidance: https://docs.github.com/articles/setting-guidelines-for-repository-contributors/
